title: Preseason ranking and rewards
body:
Hello,
I just want to confirm or clarify about when people do preseason ranking if they happen to go from Diamond into Platinum (that player is obviously diamond from season 6) and then Season 7 begins, would that player still have the diamond border in the loading screen? 

I know I could search for awhile on the forums but I didn't come across a similar question.  

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-popcorn}}

replies.body:
Short answer, yes.

Long answer, ranked rewards are influenced by your end of season standings, not your preseason. Preseason ranking will only affect your placements upon commencement of season 7.
That is what I was thinking but I get paranoid! Thank you for your answer.
No worries :) Most of that kind of info the "2016 ranked season ending soon" kinda posts but sometimes the wording can be a little confusing or lacking in specifics.
